item.title: 30 Day Blog Challenge
item.description: The primary purpose of having this blog is to maintain a list of courses I am doing, the books I am reading and the things I am learning. Also, share the important lessons that I am learning along the way. It makes complete sense to learn how to blog before starting on the real topics. So I am doing the course 30 days blog transformation challenge on Udemy. Here is a day by day challenge to improve your blogging skills.

item.title: Why Static File Generator
item.description: In this post, I talk about why we use Static file generator instead of using thing such as WordPress.
